title: #182: The Disappearance Of Madeleine McCann
description:
The team discuss the Netflix show ‘The Disappearance Of Madeleine McCann.’ Madeleine was one week away from her fourth birthday when she disappeared on the evening of May 3 2007 from the McCann apartment at the Ocean Club holiday club in Praia da Luz, Portugal.


If you have any information about Madeleine McCann in the UK:

(T): +44 (0) 207 321 9251

(E): Operation.grange@met.pnn.police.uk


The Polícia Judiciária in Portugal:

(T): +351 282 405 400

(E): Dic.portimao@pj.pt
